website_summaries.verdict: One of Mizuno’s flagship line continues to deliver a very fine performance where cushioning, arch support, and smoothness of the ride goes. If the runner can get past the wallet-thinning price, then he gets to enjoy a nicely-cushioned shoe that has noticeable responsiveness and ultra-comfortable ride.
pros: Most reviews focused on the extremely comfortable ride of the Prophecy 4
It is a highly-cushioned shoe that still feels close to the ground and stable, according to some comments
It has very good arch support for a neutral trainer as observed by quite a number of runners
The new upper is very breathable
A handful of runners valued the responsive ride despite the cushioning
The interior is plush and very soft for a luxurious feel
Dynamotion Fit greatly helps with the heel and midfoot security
Almost no break-in time needed for a shoe with lots of rubber and cushioning, noted several runners
cons: The 4th edition of the Prophecy is very expensive
The traction suffers in wet conditions

customer_reviews.title: Best ever pair of running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They are without a ​doubt the best pair of running shoes that I have ever worn. They have a huge cushioning and are extremely comfortable. I run between 3 and 4 times per week, thanks to this shoes without any issue. Actually, I have two pairs of them, and I use to rotate shoes between one run and another one. Just theories, by the way, I can't really say if there is any benefit or not. Anyhow, I will stick with this brand and type for as long as I can...
customer_reviews.author: Romualdo F.

customer_reviews.title: Came in pretty quickly too
customer_reviews.text: These are SO much nicer in person!! You can tell they're really well made. Got them as a Christmas gift for my fiancé & I've never personally owned shoes by this brand, so I can't really attest to their comfort or anything, but he's been having the white ones on his wish list for s while now. I was pleasantly surprised to find them in another color for $100 as opposed to $209 for the same shoe in white. Came in pretty quickly too. I'll update my review once he starts wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Mizuno symbol causes an issue, size down a 1/2
customer_reviews.text: First impression - Better than the model before. They tend to fit a bit larger, e.g. If you wear a 11.5 in brooks/asics then an 11 us fine. Toe-box is a bit more roomy too. After trying for 5 days - the Mizuno hard plastic symbol on the left shoe (the one on the outside) cuts into my left foot. While the sizing is perfect, this rigid piece of plastic make these shoes unbearable. I really like them and I wanted, the them to work. The older model I loved. I tried. But, I view this as a defect, maybe it's just defective in the ones I bought.
customer_reviews.author: W. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not so springy sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sneakers because I thought they had good spring in the souls. When I got the shoes they were too narrow. I wore them around the house a little to see how springy they were and they were not, they were as hard as any other shoe. I still would have sent them back even if they had fit correctly because they were not what I expected. The quality of the shoe seemed good so I am giving them 4 stars. I do not think it is fair to mark them down because they did not fit properly and were not as springy as I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth2717

customer_reviews.title: on these running shoe and I must said it was a good choice after putting these on I can immediately
customer_reviews.text: After my Adidas running shoe worn out from the sole under and grinding it out for a week from both of my feet started to feel sore and a slight pain in walking. I decided to make a purchase, on these running shoe and I must said it was a good choice after putting these on I can immediately, feel the difference in comfort, and lightness in these shoes and my heel started to adjust to the padding when I started walking and I can feel the relief with now pain or soreness in my heels. I will be getting a second pair as a backup since these are perfect for outdoors and indoors and the price is just right.
customer_reviews.author: sangkath sandara

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.  Nice wide toe box!
customer_reviews.text: i have a pair of wave prophesy 1 and 2. I didnt like 3. I really like my wave prophesy 4's. Nice wide toe box. They run slightly larger than the 1 and 2. But not much. The factory insoles are junk. Invest in nice insoles. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jersee11

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but wears quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have been through wave rider, creation and prophecy 3 shoes. I try to get 400 miles out of each pair. The prophesy 4 has been my favorite shoe for comfort but I only got about 200 miles before wearing the corner of my heal all the way down to the sub material. The wave creation shoes seem to be the most durable and bit lighter.
customer_reviews.author: TRothrock

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far, using them with Birko Sport insoles for extra arch support. Definitely a big difference in stiffness and support with those Birkos. I bought 2 pairs of Mizunos and only one with insoles right now and putting on the pair without insoles is a huge difference. Sans the Birkos are so much softer, not worth doing much except short walking in right now for me. The ones with the Birko insoles are great. Trying out these as an ex-Asics Kinsei owner whose Kinsei 5 failed to live up to expectations. Hopefully these work out better.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy G. Blum

customer_reviews.title: A new experience
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical after seeing the open sole design, however after reading the reviews and trying these on they are extremely comfortable!! I have not distance ran in them yet, however I did play some sports with my kids and the feeling of the sole coming together is something really unique and really feels much different than any gel shoe could. I hope to enjoy these for a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Landers

customer_reviews.title: Old man running!
customer_reviews.text: I run about 5 miles 4 days/week. This is my 3rd pair of Wave Prophecy Running Shoes by Mizuno. I wear them out after about 18 months running on concrete, asphalt and occasionally on a treadmill when I'm desperate. I am 44 yrs old and have some arthritis in my feet but I run so comfortably in these shoes! Keep making them, Mizuno, and I'll keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Neuhaus

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the back and knees....
customer_reviews.text: My knees and lower back have been bothering me. I ordered these shoes after doing some research online about heavy runners/walkers and recommended shoes with emphasis on the pain I was experiencing. So far I am loving these shoes and I am not experiencing any issues during or after I walk and run with them on. I only walk/run for about 45 minutes to 1.5 hours but I am sure these would perform fine if you were a long distance runner.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I thought this is an amazingly comfortable sneaker. I've tried on so many & was happy to have finally found these. It does run a little more narrow that your typical sneaker so I ordered a size up and it fits great. I really like the super giving mesh material. From the other reviews I read, some said this sneaker starts to fall apart quickly. So far mine are great & still in good shape. I'm a casual runner so maybe I'm not putting on as many miles as some of the other reviewers. Regardless I would still recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Rose

customer_reviews.title: The mesh gets quite dirty and begins to get a hole in the toe ...
customer_reviews.text: The mesh gets quite dirty and begins to get a hole in the toe area. More like wearing a pair of socks then a pair of shoes. Stones get trapped in the open heel so not too good for walking on granite. Comfortable for walking and they look nice but....
customer_reviews.author: plumbergirlisme

customer_reviews.title: Prophecy 4 better than Prophecy 2
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought 3 pair Prophecy 2 and now 2 pairs Prophecy 4, all of different colors as I like to rotate my shoes. I think Prophecy 4 sole design is a little better. I have noticed manufacturing inconsistencies between colors of a particular generation shoe. However, it is not enough to make me stop the Prophecy purchase. I also bought Wave Enigma by Mizuno, a comfortable shoe with different wear characteristics. I like both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are perfect. If I could go back in time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 pairs of running shoes at the same time. 1 for road, 1 for trail, and one because they are comfy and I wanted something to walk around in and not destroy the arch support of my running shoes. These shoes are perfect. If I could go back in time, I would have just ordered 3 of these. Thsi is the second pair of mizunos I have owned, and it makes me wonder why I still consider other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholaus Hale

customer_reviews.title: My favorite running shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Mizuno's. I started with the wave rider and then went to the wave prophecy 1 when they first came out. I absolutely loved them. These wave prophecy 4 are just as amazing as the first ones. They feel like they are throwing your feet forward and the rest of your body is just trying to keep up. Would recommend them to everyone! The price tag is high but if you can get them on sale they are worth every penny. They actually make me want to run more! I will only buy wave prophecy for my running shoes until I die.
customer_reviews.author: Luke91

customer_reviews.title: Awesome running sneaker with 1 flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sneaker for my feet. Run maybe 10-20 miles per week. The body itself has held up pretty well with no tears. The only con for me is that the outer rear area wears away really fast. I had the previous model and same issue. Never had a running sneaker wear away at the same rate or wear out to the plastic when the middle or front were still good. Docked 1 star for that. I would probably still buy because I like the shoe and it works really well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Y

customer_reviews.title: The quality of these shoes is terrible. Within 8 months of use they were ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these shoes is terrible. Within 8 months of use they were ripped and started falling apart. I would not recommend these shoes due to the poor quality. I don't use them much and they look like if they are totally worn out. These are the worse pair of shoes I have every purchased. They look very nice, but don't expect them to last at all.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: This is very comfortable shoe. They are neutral which is good for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable shoe. They are neutral which is good for me as I under pronate, or supinate, whatevery you call it ( ankles roll outwards). They are a little on the heavy side if your a runner but that is to be expected as they were designed for heavyweight runners. Extremely breathable. They are great for running the trails.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: these are the best pair of shoes next to my Doc Martins Greasy ...
customer_reviews.text: After a year of use, these are the best pair of shoes next to my Doc Martins Greasy shoes. Of course I just tried to buy a new pair but alas no size 14 available. After reading one other review about "holes" and looking at the pictures, I did locate a tiny hole. Mind you that I have been wearing them for a year mainly for work. If you have back issues or run, buy these.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: There be dragons inside!
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give these shoes five stars. Unfortunately, after about an hour into every run the hot foot gets pretty bad (like tiny dragons are nestled into each toe box). Fortunately, with enough Body Glide, I can keep the "hot" from my "foot" at bay. Otherwise, these are a decent upgrade for every day trainers (too heavy for anything performance related).
customer_reviews.author: Jack L. Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Toe box material likely to break down
customer_reviews.text: As many others have mentioned, this shoe is comfortable and great overall however it doesn't last. Both of my pinkie toes have blown out the sides of the material of the shoe and I've had them for just over a year.
customer_reviews.author: gmsuperfan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for running.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I don't give this shoe 5 stars is because the upper on these is extremely thin and fragile. I tore a hole them the second day of wearing them in a casual office work environment. That being said the thin upp breathes like no other shoe I've owned and keeps my feet extremely comfortable on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: The Undietaker

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband who states they are very comfortable and provide good arch support all day long. He states he would get another pair of these. He has owned one other pair of Mizuno's before these and states these are heavier but they have more support. I guess it all depends what you purchase them for to help you decide which model to get.
customer_reviews.author: shopgurl

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for running/working out and if you need extra support for your feet and legs.
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up for running and working out, and they are perfect. They fit as expected with the size shoe i normally wear. I have a bad knee and ankle on the same leg, and with these shoes they support my feet and legs great. I can run longer than before and stand/workout longer with these shoes on. Whenever these shoes are ready to be replaced I will buy another pair from Mizuno. It's a short review but i don't have much to say, they are a great shoe and there is nothing really more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Toth

customer_reviews.title: Durable but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Really good and comfy but it’s not lightweight at all comparing to running shoes. Quite durable though and the rubber bottom give you impulse while running or even walking.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Eduardo do Valle

customer_reviews.title: Not for me - the sole was too rigid.
customer_reviews.text: Returned these bc the sole was too rigid. I did not like the way they feel when I jog in them. But otherwise the look and feel of the shoe was good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Bought due to value but quality showed why they were discounted.
customer_reviews.text: Had shows for 46 days before a hole got rubbed into the right top of the shoe where my small toe was. Not even sure how that happened. It just appeared and then got bigger. So I never bought another mizuno product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running - At Peace with the World
customer_reviews.text: I'm 69 years old and only use them to run 60 minutes each day, three days a week - 1,200 miles for their life. That makes me very HAPPY! They are as good as the last pair I bought, which lasted me 18 months. So the question is; one pair of shoes for 18 months at $200 or three pairs for the same timeframe for $330? PLEASE don't discontinue selling them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Plenty of room at the toes
customer_reviews.text: Second pair, I love them. Plenty of room at the toes, and very comfortable on my arthritic feet. Just wished they lasted more than 400 miles without the support weakening, but haven't found a pair that does that yet! If you found this review helpful, please indicate below.
customer_reviews.author: pa

customer_reviews.title: 5th pair.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for 3 years. Probably my 4th or 5th pair of Mizuno I have bought. Great for running. I use to have shin splints when I ran with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Price

customer_reviews.title: To make matters worse, they tend to hurt my feet after a ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so loud that they're embarrassing to wear. They make a constant squeaking noise with every step. To make matters worse, they tend to hurt my feet after a few hours use. I'm 6'3 and 170lbs so I don't think I'm overloading them; they just are terrible shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Too wide And too tight
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to Brooks, thought I'd give these a try, I'm a week and about 35 miles in and will be shopping for a new pair of Brooks this weekend. Shin splints are how I know it's time for new shoes, I've had shin splints every time I've had these on. They also fit too tight around the top of my foot/ankle and there's some minor arch discomfort. Admittedly these ailments already existed, but in a shoe designed for running at this price point, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Winc36

customer_reviews.title: problem is they look really cool, but not as soft as I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Asiscs Nimbus series for the last 5 years and wanted that same cushioned feel but its just not there. I wear these at work in the hospital for 8 hours and my heels are hurting after work and never had that with the Nimbus. I have not ran in these yet and wish i could return them, problem is they look really cool, but not as soft as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: J Green

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the size they recommended. i would say they are half a size ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size they recommended. i would say they are half a size too big for me. I love the variety of buying shoes online, I hate the inaccuracy of sizing, having to send them back, etc. I chose to just not send them back.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.text: Just received these. Long time user of Gel Nimbus. These are a different ride. Firmer in heel and about as soft in front as Nimbus. Time will tell on longevity. I hope to improve my plantar fasciitis problems. Good looking shoe with more room in toe box than Nimbus 17. Fit is about same as Nimbus 16 in toe box.
customer_reviews.author: averagejoe

customer_reviews.title: #4 better than the original
customer_reviews.text: good shoe I think this version (4) is betterthan the original one's I bought years ago. The only reason for the 4 is because like most running shoes they seem to lack arch support but I'll just get the inserts. But the shoes are nice and bright and run comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ClLy

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are great. I bought some Wave Creation before
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great. I bought some Wave Creation before, but these blow those out of the water. The support is fantastic and they look pretty sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: the replacements are terrible. if anyone is selling the mens11 1/2 i ...
customer_reviews.text: these are without a doubt an incredibly well made shoe.i have owned three others since they first came out. the shame is hat they impossible to find, the replacements are terrible. if anyone is selling the mens11 1/2 i would love buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Whiting

customer_reviews.title: great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about spending this kind of money on a pair of shoes, but after doing so I plan on getting another pair once these give out. I work on concrete all day and these are the only shoes I have found tht provide ample support and cusion. I would take these over my nike air max and asics any day.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes for daily wear
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes for daily wear. Left shoe felt a bit tight and a little narrow but right was perfect. I am lucky enough to work in an office that allows jeans and sneakers, these are a god send. Not only are they comfortable for 8 hours, at least one person in my building comments on how attractive they are.
customer_reviews.author: Piper, she's small but she's big.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I have ever purchased. I have tried a number of running shoes and I have historically had knee pain after a few weeks with other brands. I have been wearing these shoes for three months now and I have not had any knee or foot pain. The support in this model is great, especially if you have a very high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: but more than that you notice the amazing support and comfort this shoe offers
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with this shoe. When I first picked it up, I was worried about how heavy it is. You definitely notice the weight at first, but more than that you notice the amazing support and comfort this shoe offers. Some nagging leg injuries have gotten much better in just a week! Well done, Mizuno.
customer_reviews.author: Tubbysan

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BRAND, A LIL WIDER
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT BRAND,A LIL WIDER,YOUR OK WITH THESE KNEES NEED NORMAL FLEXIBILITY TO BE MOBILE THEY ARE QUITE CORRECTIVE A TRUE TRIUMPH,FOR A MASS PRO. SHOE.IT DOES NOT GET BETTER,OFF TO WALMART.DR SCHOLS WILL SET ME "do right "
customer_reviews.author: ISPECIALIZEINFUN

customer_reviews.title: the sole and style perfect. running and walking very light weight
customer_reviews.text: the sole and style perfect. running and walking very light weight. but the tine toe pierced a hole on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shoe. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Updated review...after 3 months of wearing these shoes there are holes all over them. This is the most expensive shoe I've ever purchased and I am completely disappointed in the quality. I haven't worn them much for running because they're so uncomfortable. Made my shin splinys 10 times worse.
customer_reviews.author: Lvw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars for initial quality. Three stars for durability.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stable. Update to the review - rubber on the sole is too thin. I have worn through it more quickly than I had expected. Thin plastic beneath the rubber is exposed and is now tearing before the shoes have begun to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Ted C

customer_reviews.title: Good for training - not for events
customer_reviews.text: The only reason that these did not receive a 5-star rating is because they're heavy. I do not recommend them for track events because of the weight but they are a good solid running "trainer" shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MomofFourinFFX

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and stability
customer_reviews.text: My favorite most comfortable shoes I ever owned,wish they still made them.I am 6 feet tall and 230lbs.I workout daily and play sports these shoes have great stability and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan lukasik

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. I meant to get the wave creation but these turn out even better. I am a heavy guy who loves to run and these sneakers provide the comfort I need. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent shoes. Most comfortable that I have ever worn ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a B narrow foot. The D mediums fit perfectly. May be a bit narrow for the stated size. These are excellent shoes. Most comfortable that I have ever worn and I have tried many.
customer_reviews.author: Doug C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes. Great for being on my feet. Nice support. There is no extra length room in these shoes. If you think you are a little longer in the toes, go up a half a size. Color is bright! Love them
customer_reviews.author: kjs

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe I wear them for work and I walk roughly 6 miles a day at work. They are comfortable and I like the style. It isn't as good as my brooks for running but I do still enjoy them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Billy E.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have Mizuno's and absolutely love them, so I had my mom purchase these for my husband for a gift and he also loves them. After trying many other brands, I think we both think Mizuno's are the best. These shoes are are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Garris

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno shoes are the best! I have high arches and run 20+ miles ...
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno shoes are the best! I have high arches and run 20+ miles a week. I have tried several brands and these are my favorite by far. These are my second pair of Wave prophecy 4's. Couldn't be happier. Thanks Mizuno for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I've ever owned! Quality is top notch. Feels like I'm walking/running on clouds
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Great run out the box but felt a bit tight in the toe box and eventually led to some bruising on the ball of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Chas1326

customer_reviews.title: The version 4 is the best. The only downside is that the fabric in ...
customer_reviews.text: I ran with Prophecy 2,3 and 4. The version 4 is the best. The only downside is that the fabric in the front of the shoe wears out after 350 miles. Never had this problem in older versions. Nevertheless this is my 3rd pair of this version. Best shoe for me, especially at the price they are at now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Everything you are looking for and More!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg omg omg...PERFECTION!!! These are literally the most Perfect shoes I have ever worn!!! Ideal fit, comfortable, lightweight, flexible, shock absorbing, AMAZING traction, and agile!! Overall these Prophecy 4 are everything you look for in a professional running shoe!!! And they are actually very nice looking!! I would suggest this to anyone wanting to jog or run with comfort, in style, and with ease of mind!! I actually felt like I had more energy after my jog these shoes were so comfortable!!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! Will buy again!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Crisp

customer_reviews.title: They make my feet sore after a few hours of ...
customer_reviews.text: They make my feet sore after a few hours of wearing them. I purchased them to run in, but they are much heavier than my other running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: shawn880

customer_reviews.title: Great training sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Another great Mizuno product. I usually wear the Wave Creation series but decided to give these a try. They are just as comfortable and well-designed as the Wave Creation and offer great support for larger people. Help with my knee and lower back issues. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big step up from the Prophecy 3 shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and has the bungy-like shoelaces which tie great and even add to the cushion of the top of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: My favorite running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly impressed with these! Great fit, excellent materials, super comfortable! I love the laces, this material should be this markets standard! Arrived on time! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ballard

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! As a fitness enthusiast with certifications from the National Academy of Sports Medicine in Personal Training and Corrective Exercise, I have found these shoes to be well worth the cost. They're extremely durable, comfortable, stain resistant, and effectively aide with over pronation and eversion of the foot and ankle complex. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: Shoes for great and are comfortable. Have a nice spring in the step for walking and running and are nimble enough to effectively drive stick.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Parr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, I'm a nurse and they started falling apart ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, I'm a nurse and they started falling apart within 2-3 months. They were comfortable and soft. If the fabric material didn't wear holes so quickly I'd still wear them and given a better review. I wasn't hard on them either. Work 12 hour days, but fell apart too quick.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it. I don't know if its the design ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it. I don't know if its the design or one have to get used to it. I took it out for 4 mile run and it gave me blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Ratings Man

customer_reviews.title: Prophecy 4 -- Dependable, Solid Ride, and a bit $$$$
customer_reviews.text: The Prophecy 4 is a good, solid shoe. It offers a good, feel-the-ground ride. A bit pricey. However, this should soon be on sale. The Prophecy 5 are due October 2015. 4 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Terry Banker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, and the grip is amazing. Best running shoes I've had so far. A pair like this really makes a difference when running long distances.
customer_reviews.author: firerescue6786

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the Prophecy 2, 3 and 4 but Material on top of toes wears down fast.  Comfort is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Top of the material wears fast and have problems with each pair purchased but this shoe is my favorite shoe brand! If material on top could be more durable to last would really be perfect (my only complaint)! I've purchased 4 pair to day in the past 1.5 yrs, hoping I can get some credit or coupon on next purchase as each shoe has same type of wear and tear on top of knuckle of toes area. Purchased 4 pairs to date and not cheap shoes but are most comfortable for athletes! Love Jordan's but now a fan of MINUZO.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Best Walking/Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe. Color scheme does make shoe stand out.
customer_reviews.author: senior

customer_reviews.title: Great triathlon and marathon kicks for heel strikers
customer_reviews.text: My 5th or sixth pair of these, I'm a 220 lb triathlete and runner who is a heel striker and these shoes are perfect for my running style , they look beautiful and they make you look great , very washable
customer_reviews.author: Geoone

customer_reviews.title: Very cushioning thick sole
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cushioning, although a little thick in the sole. A little stiff in the fore foot. Fairly stable
customer_reviews.author: Victor T

customer_reviews.title: ... Prophecy 4 Running shoes fit well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The Prophecy 4 Running shoes fit well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Great and better cushion than all other shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes have a sore back and I need them to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for some feet
customer_reviews.text: I actually sent these back because of the fit. For some feet, I think this shoe is awesome..... just not mine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: It's Mizuno's masterpiece. Perfect for people who weight a lot and want to start Jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: I really like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes. I am a female. I have had the ones for women they are very comfortable; however a hole came in the top after about 8 months. I hope these will last longer because you cannot beat the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Walk in clouds
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. Looks better in person. Like walking on clouds. I have very sensitive feet and most shoes hurt me. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Edna

customer_reviews.title: Love this running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying shoes on Amazon, and was very pleased! My husband hadn't tried Mizunos for running yet, but has been very please with this shoe. It's light, has ample support and his plantar fasciitis has definitely improved. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Mizuno the only sneaker that I wear!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mathath

customer_reviews.title: Provides excellent support and is holding up well to a strenuous ...
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers were purchased for 12 hour standing work shift on concrete surface. Provides excellent support and is holding up well to a strenuous work schedule. Body of the shoe allows for adequate ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After you buy these shoes you won't be able to like other shoes more... These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. These are my 3rd pair in 2 years, definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: These were my favorite shoes ever...
customer_reviews.text: These were my favorite shoes ever....until I bought a pair of Hoka One One's Vanquish. Still love them, but the cushioning on the Hokas are superior for my size (6'4" 275#).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great show but pinky toe ripped out on both feet in 2 months
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Mizuno for running for many years. I know the size that works for me and I can run in a brand new pair for several miles without any issues. They feel very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had the version 3 of this product and this one (version 4) has a little bit more room in the toe box and rolls of the ball of the foot better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Packers920

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I am a very heavy runner and these offer great support for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I had the Wave Creation 16 first and swore it was the best running shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I have the Wave Prophecy 4 and the Wave Creation 16. I had the Wave Creation 16 first and swore it was the best running shoe ever. Now that award goes to the Wave Propecy 4, which feels incredibly comfortable. The Wave Prophecy 4 feels as if they are self-propelled. It's almost like I'm cheating.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Have tried several brands
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Have tried several brands. These are my favorite. Great comfort and I use them for running medium distance.
customer_reviews.author: townsend

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: Still the best running shoe I've owned at almost 200 miles. Still have another 100-200 left in them. Get these!
customer_reviews.author: Missile Technician

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort shoes for me with a very edgy look!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pairs of Mizuno prophecy line up.. This shoes makes me last walking all day at work!
customer_reviews.author: Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe as always from Mizuno. Use their shoe fit finder to find a model that's right for you.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe I wore it out over the course of ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe I wore it out over the course of a year and half, I would recommend walking around in them for a week or so before running to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Stalker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are a little harder than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Replacing an old pair of Mizunos. These feel great and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable shoe I have ever owned. I am not a runner, but my feet are sensitive to a shoe with proper support.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes I've ever owned. I tried to order more but they are out of my size. 😩
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased many other shoes from other companies like Brooks, Asics
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but this shoe has worked for me. I suffer from calf strains when I run and the only shoe that has helped with preventing this injury is the Mizuno Prophecy 4. I've purchased many other shoes from other companies like Brooks, Asics, and Saucony.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Francisco Cedillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to run on concrete
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman, wear a 8.5 for women and got a 7 for this. Perfect fit. They are so so so comfortable to run on concrete
customer_reviews.author: RM

feature_bullets: Lace-up runner featuring ombre-mesh upper and patterned outsole
U4iC midsole with full-length Infinity Wave
